title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.101 - Corned beef brisket
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.101 - Corned beef brisket

State Regulations

In preparing "Corned Beef Brisket", the application of
curing solution to the beef brisket shall not result in an increase in the
weight of the finished cured product of more than 20 percent over the weight of
the fresh uncured brisket. If the product is cooked, the weight of the finished
product shall not exceed the weight of the fresh uncured
brisket. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
319.101

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
